description: Seize the ski day with Men's ski socks that help you stay outside longer — naturally. Our Ski Targeted Cushion OTC Socks puts cushioning and body-mapped mesh zones everywhere you need it for maximum comfort and breathability in any boot. Next time you hit the slopes, bring the natural performance of Merino wool along for the ride.
name: Smartwool Ski Targeted Cushion Over The Calf Socks - Mens

specs.value: 57% Merino Wool, 10% Nylon, 30% Recycled Nylon, 3% Elastane
